page.title: 17LAND COVER
page.content: {Gildersome:}a semi-rural village 5 miles south of Leeds.Housing:stone & brick built.Half of area is farmland {New Farnley:}farms & houses on fringe of main housing development.80% of the land used for farming. {Lower Wortley:}split 33% light indust- ry & warehouses,33% housing & 33% farmland.The area contains a chemical factory,a large Ford garage which specialises in car sales and compon- ents & also numerous small garages with services.Dunlop & Ranken Steel Factory is also a main feature.The area has a large DIY home improvements centre & also a large Furniture Centre {Both Gildersome & Low Wortley}have libraries & all 3 areas have shopping centres owned by various small traders Five primary schools are in the area.
